about_the_game:
QuickBite Express is a mix of an ultra-dynamic platformer and a courier simulator. Experience all the challenges and adrenaline of this profession by delivering orders on time and in perfect condition through the most unexpected areas of cities.

Key Features

  • High Dynamics. You are the fastest courier in the world. Be even faster to avoid getting 2-star ratings in the app.
  • Superpowers. Earn bonus points and acquire new superpowers to deliver orders faster to your valued customers. Control time, use a jetpack, teleport. And remember — the customer is always right!
  • Variety of Locations. Forget about water, fire, and copper pipes. Your shortest route on the map goes through wastelands, garages, industrial zones, bridges, busy highways, rooftops, and skyscrapers.
  • Rating. Deliver orders on time and undamaged! Once you gather enough positive reviews, we’ll allow you to work in an entirely new city. Deal?
  • Navigator. With our voice assistant, you won't get lost and won't feel lonely. And if you're very smart, you can turn it off and manage on your own.
detailed_description:
QuickBite Express is a mix of an ultra-dynamic platformer and a courier simulator. Experience all the challenges and adrenaline of this profession by delivering orders on time and in perfect condition through the most unexpected areas of cities.

Key Features

  • High Dynamics. You are the fastest courier in the world. Be even faster to avoid getting 2-star ratings in the app.
  • Superpowers. Earn bonus points and acquire new superpowers to deliver orders faster to your valued customers. Control time, use a jetpack, teleport. And remember — the customer is always right!
  • Variety of Locations. Forget about water, fire, and copper pipes. Your shortest route on the map goes through wastelands, garages, industrial zones, bridges, busy highways, rooftops, and skyscrapers.
  • Rating. Deliver orders on time and undamaged! Once you gather enough positive reviews, we’ll allow you to work in an entirely new city. Deal?
  • Navigator. With our voice assistant, you won't get lost and won't feel lonely. And if you're very smart, you can turn it off and manage on your own.

short_description: QuickBite Express is an ultra-dynamic platformer about the challenges of courier work. Deliver orders on time and undamaged across multiple cities to maintain your rating.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Greek, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
